item.title: CVE-2023-49179|2023-12-15T14:45:17.613Z -- n.o.u.s.%20open%20useful%20and%20simple -- event%20post
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in N.O.U.S. Open Useful and Simple Event post allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Event post: from n/a through 5.8.6.
